text: Elizabeth Folan Gilpin (born July 21, 1986) is an American actress. She was born in New York City. Gilpin is best known for playing Debbie "Liberty Belle" Eagan in the Netflix comedy series GLOW (2017–present). == Career == She was nominated for two Primetime Emmy Awards for Outstanding Supporting Actress in a Comedy Series. She also starred as Dr. Carrie Roman in the Showtime comedy- drama series Nurse Jackie (2013–2015). In 2020, she starred as Detective Linda Watts in the Netflix comedy movie Coffee & Kareem. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:21st-century American actors
title: Betty Gilpin
